scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.deploy:development: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions --project hooked-development
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions --project hooked-69
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions --project hooked-staging
scripts.deploy:all-regions: npm run deploy:israel && npm run deploy:australia && npm run deploy:us && npm run deploy:eu && npm run deploy:asia
scripts.deploy:israel: npm run build && FUNCTION_REGION=me-west1 firebase deploy --only functions --project hooked-development --force
scripts.deploy:australia: npm run build && FUNCTION_REGION=australia-southeast2 firebase deploy --only functions --project hooked-development --force
scripts.deploy:us: npm run build && FUNCTION_REGION=us-central1 firebase deploy --only functions --project hooked-development --force
scripts.deploy:eu: npm run build && FUNCTION_REGION=europe-west3 firebase deploy --only functions --project hooked-development --force
scripts.deploy:asia: npm run build && FUNCTION_REGION=asia-northeast1 firebase deploy --only functions --project hooked-development --force
